# Draft:2032 Irish Presidential Election__disambig_1

The 2032 Irish Presidential election, will take place before the end of 2032.
At this time, to be placed on the ballot, a candidate must:
Be over 35
and
Have the support of either:
A) 20 OÃ­reachtas members
B) 4 Councils
Catherine Connolly is entitled to a place on the ballot as she has won the 2025 Presidential Election
